extendedInfo.description: My Spotlight Online is a unique and powerful social networking enabler for independent artist trying to break into the music industry. We target independent and unsigned artists, producers, engineers and songwriters. We are hear to cater and stand up for the Indie artists!We are the only FREE, multilingual music industry social networking website, targeted to independent artists while providing further exposure opportunities at no cost to YOU! All you have to do is create a FREE profile and upload clean âRADIOâ versions of your music and having other members and fans rank it.Our mission is to simply provide independent artists a chance to further their career in the music business through education and consistent exposure in a variety of media opportunities. Thank you for joining and stepping into YOUR Spotlight!

reviews.title: Redundant
reviews.comment: I cannot create an account due to the account sign up feature. the app will not let me make an account without a profile picture. the picture upload link does not work. So I cannot create an account. Will install until they fix bug. Samsung Galaxy rush boost mobile.
reviews.author: A Google User
